titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Rockefeller University records, Controller FA215

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-10-31 01:51:30 -0400.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical note
bioghist.p: In 1970/1971 David J. Lyons came to the University as Director of Economic Planning. In 1971/1972 he was named Controller, an executive officer which he remained until the fall of 1978.
In 1978 with Dr. Joshua Lederberg, the new president of the University, Mr. Lyons was elected a Vice President of the University to continue as Controller but with new managerial responsibilities.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Types of records include: photographs, ledgers, and account books.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Individual microforms may be restricted from scholarly access due to preservation concerns.
